## HSL.alpha() method

Set the alpha (transparency) value of the color.

Value passed must be a percentage;

```ts
const hsl = HSL.create('hsl(180, 50%, 50%, 0.5)');
hsl.alpha(40).a // => 40

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alpha(alpha?: number | string): HSL;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  alpha | <code>number &#124; string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`HSL`
